create_all_tables: create table orders (order_id int primary key, customer_id int, order_date date, total_amount decimal(10,2), region varchar(255),foreign key (customer_id) references customers(customer_id));
create table sales(sale_id int, order_id int, product_id int, quantity int, price decimal(10,2), foreign key (order_id) references orders(order_id));
